text:
="preserve">Josep Ramon Mòdol i Pifarré (21 September 1957 – 10 July 2020) was a Spanish sociologist, politician and writer. He was born in Lleida, Catalonia. Mòdol i Pifarré was a Deputy between 1989 to 1993. He was a Senator between from 1996 to 2000.
Mòdol i Pifarré died on 10 July 2020 from cancer in Barcelona, aged 62.
